mapper.insert: insert into board(btitle, bcontent, bcount, bdate ,mno, b_tno ) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, #{registeredDate} ,#{writer.no}, #{boardTypeNo})
mapper.select:
select b.bno, b.btitle,
b.bdate, b.bcount, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name, t.b_tno from board b inner join member m on m.mno=b.mno inner join b_type t on t.b_tno=b.b_tno
where b.btitle like concat('%', #{value},'%') or b.bcontent like concat('%', #{value},'%') or m.mname like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by b.bno desc

select b.bno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bdate, b.bcount, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name, t.b_tno, p.bphoto from board b inner join member m on m.mno=b.mno inner join b_type t on t.b_tno=b.b_tno left outer join b_photo p on p.bno=b.bno where b.bno = #{value} order by bno desc
